name: Productasaur
flavor: Product-type. Likes to schedule meetings. Good at having other Polymon battle.

name: Horse
flavor: horse

name: Ginzard
flavor: Quick and agile, though enjoys basking in the sun atop a warm rock.

name: Seadata
flavor: It likes to munch on DOM tree leaves while basking under a shadow root.

name: Elliophant
flavor: Though last to the office, it can quickly sneak up behind you for a "quick" question. After gaining speed, it can rampage through issues.

name: Bobdod
flavor: Is a bear or a koala or something. Its secret weapon is the hug. Of death.

name: Meownicat
flavor: Meownicat is a byproduct of unchecked Unicode experiments. It is perceptive and smells faintly of blueberries.

name: Bideldore
flavor: Bideldore will unleash a deadly fire vomit at the mention of native apps or CoffeeScript.

name: Brainana
flavor: Brainana is clever, but clumsy.  It's friendliness make it an a-peeling addition to any roster.  (Take not to slip on it, though!)

name: Jigglystache
flavor: A pedantic type Polymon, Jigglystache's main weapons are sarcasm, persiflage, and an almost fanatical devotion to the web.

name: Danguin
flavor: It usually stays hidden under the snow, but can pop out at any time to solve problems.

name: Octorvel
flavor: It will jump at the opportunity to share its deep wisdom. It likes to share for long periods of time.

name: Spector
flavor: It likes to mess around with specifications, imagining it is making them better.

name: Shquid
flavor: This Polymon will shrug, say "why not", and work out a solution when asked deep and meaningful development questions.

name: Aerotwist
flavor: Full of hot air and may trash your stuff.

name: Valtorb
flavor: Very Focused, can be Blurred only by a soccer ball.

name: KABONS
flavor: A fan of chain reactions, KABONS knows that sometimes you have to blow the whole thing up and start fresh.

name: Fredosaurus
flavor: Fredosaurus always shows up to celebrate a job well done. But don't be fooled: He's really here to snack on your easy-to-reach plants.

name: Beardiak
flavor: Fire(base) type Polymon. Friendly and easygoing, unless you make trouble for the Web Platform. Then watch out!

name: Dalphinaer
flavor: Aggregator of things

name: Rootsfirmiles
flavor: Ancient Polymon, hard to uproot. It's bark is worse than it's bite.

name: Alienuel
flavor: Alienuel came from a planet in the constellation of sagittarius!

name: Noreasturr
flavor: Materializes out of the apparent calm, enveloping friends and enemies alike in a blanket of gray.

name: Ricitic
flavor: Curious and inquisitive, it loves to bounce from project to project, trying a little bit of everything. Anxious but excitable.

name: Ramulan
flavor: Obsessively curious and will eat almost anything. Skilled at balancing in precarious places.

name: Keanugator
flavor: It likes to sit in the sun and take a bite out of bugs. It wishes there's a real emoji for alligators.

name: Domdriform
flavor: Domdriform is tree-shaped Polymon which can detach, rearrange and reattach its many branches.

name: Frankiemon
flavor: I like to build cool things.

name: Salgoud
atSummit: No (don't worry, you still get a Polymon!)

name: Moussaka
flavor: Old and weary, it laughs at the world, those around it and (most of all) itself.
atSummit: No (don't worry, you still get a Polymon!)

name: KonfusedKevin
flavor: Excels at factual exchanges. Has trouble understanding references to games, fiction, and other fun things.
atSummit: No (don't worry, you still get a Polymon!)

name: Mattata
flavor: King of the jungle. Mostly looks cuddly and chill until another polymon rouses his ire.

name: Marsupimike
flavor: Looks cuddly, from a distance. Protective of its team. Big claws are kept hidden, but will come out if provoked.
atSummit: No (don't worry, you still get a Polymon!)

name: Gläzfather
flavor: Lives on North Pole and only appears once in a blue moon, mostly to eat cookies, spread the cheer, and share hopelessly optimistic timelines.
atSummit: No (don't worry, you still get a Polymon!)

name: Mushron
flavor: An unpredictable, shady character. May or may not be poisonous.

name: Komorama
flavor: Big and slow and unintimidating.

name: Writerpuff
flavor: It's not lazy; it's efficient.

name: Ramen
flavor: A steaming bowl of soup. It is extra tasty on a rainy day.

name: Taco
flavor: The second most delightful way to package food. Loves to put its HTML, CSS and JS in one file.

name: Dumpling
flavor: A tasty dumpling. Yum!

name: Pie
flavor: It is haunted by the sense that the better part of itself has gone missing.

name: Bao
flavor: Who doesn't love a good steamed bun? No one. Love the Bao, or else.

name: Hargow
flavor: A mysterious dumpling from outer space. Legends say it has psychic flavor powers.

name: Beet
flavor: Some have a heart as big as their chest - but despite seeming rough, Beet has one as big as his belly.

name: Shroom
flavor: Being this miserable expression hides a great mind. Always here to help, he may seem reluctant but will get the job done.

name: Donnie
flavor: With an expression that take up almost her entire body, Donnie has no option but to wear her heart on her sleeve. Luckily that expression is mostly a happy one, unless you get on her bad side in which case...

name: Radish
flavor: Extremely clumsy, but extremely fun. Don't underestimate him though, behind that goofy smile lies some dark secrets...
